title: Deadlock on exit in Dev Mode
body:
### Describe the bug

I have a few times observed that the dev-mode can deadlock when trying to quit (e.g. by pressing `q` or `ctrl-c`). This time I connected with the debugger and got the thread dumps.

### Expected behavior

_No response_
